channel.title: Eruption-X - 2 Custom Minigames & Partyroom
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2mob8tx.jpg[/img] [url=http://eruption-x.co.cc]Forums Here[/url] [/center] Base:Project Insanity (Rune Choice) [u]Staff List_____________________________________________________________________[/u][center] Owner:Xaero Co-owner:Alec Hoster:You Can Apply For It Admin:K H E Mods:James, Ben[/center] [u]Information___________________________________________________________________[/u][center] All skills work and we also have a Skillng Guild. Friendly staff. Daily growing community. Webclient and downloadable client. Easy to start. Great PK system. Two custom minigames: RaceWars & Last Man Standing. Normal minigames: Pest Control, Barrows, Duel Arena, Tzhaar, Godwars. Full bosses: Godwars bosses, KBD, Daganoth Kings etc. Fully working Party Room with chest, baloons and dancing knights. All skillcape emotes. Old 2005 graphics. It?s not a Hybrid Pvp or a DSPK or a iHybrid. It?s based on a normal 317 source. New items: pvp items, spirit shields, godswords, dragon claws etc. Teleport to any place for donators+. Enjoy! :P[/center] [u]Screenshots___________________________________________________________________[/u][center] [img]http://19541980.ucoz.com/newscreens/home.bmp[/img] [img]http://19541980.ucoz.com/partyroom/proom.png[/img] [img]http://19541980.ucoz.com/newscreens/lms.bmp[/img] [img]http://19541980.ucoz.com/newscreens/inside.bmp[/img] item.title: Eruption-X - 2 Custom Minigames & Partyroom
item.dc:creator: @ZLee ZLee
item.description:
@ZLee wrote:

Name: Zane
Country: USA
Type of hosting: I have a dedicated server with a Gigabit connection, Intel Xeon Quadcore and 12 GB DDR3 RAM.
MSN: Don’t use it anymore, but can get me at zlee444@gmail.com
Skype: No use for it. I use Ventrilo.
About you: I am an experienced hoster. I don’t deal with VPSs and kids who host from their home computers. I use only dedicated servers in data centers.

Read full topic

item.title: Eruption-X - 2 Custom Minigames & Partyroom
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

Name: Max
Msn: Maxacollins@gmail.com
Skype: Maxacollins@gmail.com
Coded Server’s: LoveScape, LuckScape, MaxScape, Godz-Scape, AncientPkScape, and RevoltuionX.
About you: I have been with RuneScape server’s (Moparscape) since 2008. I have been coding clients ever since and I have started coding/hosting servers in 2010. Ever since i found out how to portforward I’ve been Coding servers and hosting them like crazy! I recently quit my server due to many reasons. So now I’m looking for a new one. I can code forums… Webclient, Any client, Almost anything you need on the server I can code. I know almost everything about servers… Theres only 1 thing I’m weak with… Epilison I don’t know how to use it and I probably never will. Sorry haha. Anyways add my msn please? I’d love to help out!

Read full topic

item.title: Eruption-X - 2 Custom Minigames & Partyroom
item.dc:creator: @antirock75 antirock75
item.description:
@antirock75 wrote:

[quote=“Xx Weed Xx, post:72, topic:366639”][quote author=antirock75 link=topic=462840.msg3552866#msg3552866 date=1301660655]
Wtf skillcape tutorial ahahah. BUHAAHWWahha… For delta ye. There is no tut for project insanity. Your tutorial sucks cuz i looked it. Haha you cant even fix preloading models. ::dumpmodels will change normal objects cuz you give wrong ids to the models. XD hahaha

Nice, but there is a lot of leeches in this. But good work! Keep it up!

Omfg i didnt leech anything. The source im using was very fucked up and all items were invisible.
[/quote]

Why did you use a ‘very fucked source’ that’s going to get you no where.[/quote]
Gah… It’s not fucked up anymore. I fixed everything that was broken and i have added pvp items. spirit shields, d claws etc. Plus i have added a custom minigame and ill add some more in the future.

Read full topic

item.title: Eruption-X - 2 Custom Minigames & Partyroom
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

[quote=“pkerA, post:65, topic:366639”][quote author=Xx Weed Xx link=topic=462840.msg3549615#msg3549615 date=1301427354]

[i]Position: Web / forum master.

Name: Dan.

Msn: Unleashedx@hotmail.co.uk

Skype: Russianhustla.

Coded HTMLs before?: Yes.

About you: I enjoy administrating, It’s not the ‘power’ (If you can call it that), I’m definitely not a power freak, I just enjoy the recognition and respect that comes from this position. I would really appreciate If you could give me an opportunity to show my work. I mean when I do a job I do it right not some half as shit.[/i]

that spot is taken via by me i am co owner, graphic designer, and web designer

Sure okay, I don’t mind.
[/quote]

You better don’t! This is just shit![/quote]

Okay first of all I have better web developing knowledge then your current person, secondly I don’t make .smfnew.com sites and register them under a .tk domain that has nothing to do with the server. Kthx, And If you’re wondering why I applied for this job it’s because I wanted to help you out but I see now that your development team are a bunch of 12 year old people who just discovered PI.

Read full topic
